name: Rikka Takanashi (Chuunibyou demo Koi ga Shitai!) LoRA
description:
1. Chuunibyou demo Koi ga Shitai! 🎡

Rikka Takanashi LoRA.

Using eyepatch as a prompt can help to get closer to Rikkas look.

Works well with a weight around 0.6-0.9.

Got some really nice results with MeinaMix.
But it works great on other models too. Would love reviews and see what can be generated with this.

meta.prompt: <lora:RikkaTakanashi:0.8>,high res, masterpiece,Rikka Takanashi, black hair, solo, 1girl, outside, blue sky, hiking, outside, woods, detailed eyes, (blue eye), eyepatch
